## Get Data

```{r}
# Get highway data from OSM

query <- getbb("Leuven, Belgium") %>% 
   opq() %>% 
   add_osm_feature("highway") %>% 
   osmdata_sf()

leuHighways <- query$osm_lines

```

## Wrangle Data

```{r}
# Clean data

leuHighways <- leuHighways %>% 
  select(osm_id, highway, geometry) %>% 
  st_transform(3857)

```

```{r}
# Now, I want a minimum bounding box

leuBound <- leuHighways %>% 
  st_bbox() %>% 
  st_as_sfc()

mapBound <- leuBound %>% 
  st_centroid() %>% 
  st_buffer(6000)

mapLimit <- leuBound %>% 
  st_centroid() %>% 
  st_buffer(6500)

```

```{r}
# Clip data to this area

leuHighwaysFilter <- leuHighways %>% 
  st_intersection(mapBound)

leuHighwaysFilter %>% 
  st_set_geometry(NULL) %>% 
  group_by(highway) %>% 
  summarise(count = n()) %>% 
  arrange(desc(count)) %>% 
  view()
```

```{r}
# Assign priority

leuHighwaysFilter <- leuHighwaysFilter %>% 
  filter(highway == "residential" |
           highway == "pedestrian" |
           highway == "cycleway" |
           highway == "footway") %>% 
  mutate(highway = case_when(highway == "residential" ~ "Residential",
                             highway == "pedestrian" ~ "Pedestrian",
                             highway == "cycleway" ~ "Cycleway",
                             highway == "footway" ~ "Footway"))
```

## Build Map

```{r}
# Build the base layer

vizBase <- tm_shape(mapLimit) +
  tm_fill(col = "#000000") +
  tm_shape(mapBound) +
  tm_fill(col = "#000000") +
  tm_borders(col = "#f1eee9",
             lwd = 1) +
  tm_layout(bg.color = "#000000",
            frame = F,
            frame.lwd = NA,
            attr.outside = F,
            outer.margins = 0,
            asp = 0,
            scale = 0.8,
            main.title = "Low Traffic Streets",
            main.title.color = "#f1eee9",
            main.title.size = 1.75,
            main.title.fontfamily = "Arial Narrow",
            main.title.fontface = 2,
            main.title.position = "center",
            title = "Leuven",
            title.color = "#f1eee9",
            title.size = 1.25,
            title.position = c("center", "TOP"),
            title.fontface = 2,
            legend.position = c("right", "bottom"),
            legend.title.color = "#000000",
            legend.text.color = "#f1eee9",
            legend.height = -0.1) + 
  tm_credits("#30DayMapChallenge | Day 22 | Anirudh Govind | Nov 2021\nMap data Â© OpenStreetMap contributors and available from https://www.openstreetmap.org",
             col = "#f1eee9",
             size = 0.75,
             position = c("left", "bottom"),
             fontfamily = "Arial Narrow")
```

```{r}
# Build the other layers

myPalette <- wes_palette("Royal1")

vizHighways <- tm_shape(leuHighwaysFilter) +
  tm_lines(col = "highway",
           palette = myPalette,
           lwd = 1)

```

```{r}
# Put layers together

viz <- vizBase +
  vizHighways
```

## Export

```{r}
# Export the map as an image to upload onto twitter

tmap_save(tm = viz,
          filename = here::here("2021/exports/Day22.png"),
          dpi = 450,
          width = 200,
          height = 200,
          units = "mm")

```
